SELECT MENU_ID, PAR_MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_NM_EN, MENU_URL FROM TB_META_MENU
ORDER BY MENU_ID ASC

SELECT T1.RNUM, T1.MENU_ID, T1.PAR_MENU_ID, T1.MENU_NM, T1.MENU_NM_EN, T1.MENU_URL, T1.LVL, T1.GRP FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT MENU_ID, PAR_MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_NM_EN, MENU_URL, 1 AS LVL, MENU_ID AS GRP
FROM tb_meta_menu WHERE PAR_MENU_ID IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT B.MENU_ID, B.PAR_MENU_ID, B.MENU_NM, B.MENU_NM_EN, B.MENU_URL, LVL + 1 AS LVL, B.PAR_MENU_ID AS GRP
FROM tb_meta_menu B
INNER JOIN CTE C ON B.PAR_MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID
)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GRP, LVL) AS RNUM, MENU_ID, PAR_MENU_ID, CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', LVL-1), MENU_NM) AS MENU_NM, MENU_NM_EN, MENU_URL, LVL, GRP
FROM CTE
WHERE 1=1
) T1
WHERE T1.RNUM BETWEEN ((#{cntPerPage} * (#{curPage}-1)) + 1) AND (#{cntPerPage} * #{curPage})

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT MENU_ID, PAR_MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_NM_EN, MENU_URL, 1 AS LVL, MENU_ID AS GRP
FROM tb_meta_menu WHERE PAR_MENU_ID IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT B.MENU_ID, B.PAR_MENU_ID, B.MENU_NM, B.MENU_NM_EN, B.MENU_URL, LVL + 1 AS LVL, B.PAR_MENU_ID AS GRP
FROM tb_meta_menu B
INNER JOIN CTE C ON B.PAR_MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID
)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GRP, LVL) AS RNUM, MENU_ID, PAR_MENU_ID, CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', LVL-1), MENU_NM) AS MENU_NM, MENU_NM_EN, MENU_URL, LVL, GRP
FROM CTE
WHERE 1=1
) T1
